  • Field Details

    • mainNamespace

      public static Map<String,Object> mainNamespace
      The class is responsible for controlling the functionality of the buttons. For each tab, the buttons (for example add, remove etc.) must act differently.

    • mainWindow

      public static javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader mainWindow

  • Method Details

    • switchToNewWindow

      public void switchToNewWindow(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent) throws IOException
      The function allows you to switch to a new window depending on the current state. Each state defines a different overload for this function, because for each state the buttons (add, remove, etc.) work differently.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
